title: DLC For Assassin’s Creed Valhalla - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.20.20
description:
Imran and Fran talk about Master Chief Collection getting updated for Series X, PT not being backwards compatible, and tons of Assassin’s Creed Valhalla DLC content.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:20 - Housekeeping
Check out Greg and Blessing start Ghost of Tsushima: Legends over on YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), Black Jack, & Tom Bock
The Roper Report   -
00:07:45 - Halo: The Master Chief Collection Getting Optimizations For Xbox Series X And Series S (Alessandro Barbosa @ GameSpot)
00:22:05 - Xbox iPhone And iPad App Updates Let You Play Remotely (Steve Watts @ GameSpot)
00:26:00 - PT won’t be backwards compatible with the PS5 (Hirun Cryer @ GamesRadar)
00:36:12 - Assassin’s Creed Valhalla Post-Launch Detailed (Ubisoft News)
00:45:33 - Destiny 2 – Beyond Light – Story Reveal Trailer
00:47:00 - Out today
00:50:10 - Reader mail   -
00:51:50 - When I see a Triple A games announced - I'm at the point where I expect the date to be changed at least once, do we see announcements being any smoother with next gen? - Sam Gray
00:55:50 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and David Janeaux
